author: Vikas Vasudeva
title: Chandigarh police step in to prevent migration of workers
description: Personnel convincing those on the move to return, making arrangements for them in shelters
content: On his way to Mathura in Uttar Pradesh, after walking from a town in Himachal Pradesh, Lachman Singh a truck driver reached Chandigarh on Monday morning where the police stopped him. He along with a few others were asked to go back even as they said that they… [+2775 chars]
